Function Documentation

int rbxDigout_getPort (  int  podHandle,
int  digoutId,
int *  port
) 
 

Gets a digout's physical output port number on the device (one-based).

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the digout's parent Pod
[in] digoutId the digout's ID (one-based)
[out] port pointer to an int that receives the digout's physical port on the device
Returns:
RBX_E_DIGOUT_ID_INVALID if the specified digout ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxDigout_getMod (  int  podHandle,
int  digoutId,
int *  mod
) 
 

Gets a digout's modification number.

This number is incremented every time the digout's value changes.

This function is typically used to determine if the digout's value has changed.

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the digout's parent Pod
[in] digoutId the digout's ID (one-based)
[out] mod pointer to an int that receives the digout's mod
Returns:
RBX_E_DIGOUT_ID_INVALID if the specified digout ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes

int rbxDigout_getValue (  int  podHandle,
int  digoutId,
int *  digoutVal
) 
 

Gets the value of a digout.

Parameters:
[in] podHandle a handle to the digout's parent Pod
[in] digoutId the digout's ID (one-based)
[out] digoutVal pointer to an int that receives the digout's value;
1 (one) = digout on, 0 (zero) = digout off
Returns:
RBX_E_DIGOUT_ID_INVALID if the specified digout ID is invalid
RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID if the specified Pod handle is invalid
generic Robix Error Codes
